line_1: The slender hair-bell on the purple heather;
line_2: Two tiny imps, who scarcely stooped to gather

line_1: And I've been wading through the heather;
line_2: Their herd was gone I know not whither.

line_1: Thou dost for her the Dunsbourn heather,
line_2: The primrose and the daisy gather,

line_1: Till whare ye sit, on craps o' heather,
Till whare ye sit, on craps o' heather,
line_2: Tho' whyles ye moistify your leather,
